title: Gamification-Based MOOC Design for Job-Oriented ESP Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and understanding of fundamental job-related terminology
context.additional_context: Need to improve job-specific English proficiency, including mathematical concepts, for administrative/managerial professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize 50 job-related mathematical terms with 80% accuracy using gamification elements.
Learners complete five types of work simulation scenarios through role-play missions (quests) within a digital platform.
Learners submit job report projects, including mathematical analysis, through collaborative mission performance.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
